org.nd4j.linalg.ops.reduceops.scalarops

Interface ScalarOp

  • All Superinterfaces:
    com.google.common.base.Function<INDArray,Float>
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    BaseScalarOp, Max, Mean, Min, Norm1, Norm2, NormMax, Prod, StandardDeviation, Sum, Variance

    public interface ScalarOp
extends com.google.common.base.Function<INDArray,Float>
    A scalar op over an ndarray (iterates through the whole ndarray for an aggregate result)
    Author:
    Adam Gibson
